RealtyZone.io is a Real Estate web portal whose aim is to provide Data Analytics solutions, property listing functionality and CRM software. Currently the website is in alpha stage or more clearly we are working hard towards the launch of the MVP. Our solutions will rely on Metasearch algorithms and AI technology. So, with our products you will be able to have access to big amount of real estate data. Main products that we are currently working on and may be available by the end of 2022 are: Property Valuation Tool, Heatmap for investors and Heatmap with prices. RealtyZone.io is being designed to meet the needs of all users. As private user as well as professional users, from brokers/agents to real estate investors.

We build human-ready enterprise software and analytics to revolutionize the way organizations make strategic decisions. We bring together business, data science, and engineering expertise to build AI solutions that amplify people’s analytical capabilities, foster collaboration, and dramatically increase speed-to-output. Our first product, HUMAN-Advisor, is a business strategist. She answers colloquial questions about your business with analysis, narrative storylines, actionable recommendations, and implementation roadmaps. Think of HUMAN-Advisor as the star analyst in your team who knows her stuff, listens, communicates clearly, and never stops learning.
